patthana17.7:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
patthana17.7:0.3_0: should apply himself to see clearly.
patthana17.7:1.1_0: Looking on the unskillful should not be given up, relying on not seeing.
patthana17.7:2.1_0: Unskillfulness should be given up by developing, not by cultivating the unskillful.
patthana17.7:3.1_0: Not developing or cultivating answering, they should not give up wrong perspective.
